articles.title: Night Sky Festival fully returning to Shenandoah National Park - WHSV
articles.description: With the help of amateur astronomers and a veteran NASA astronaut, the astronomy based festival will present topics from asteroid defense to large craters in the U.S.
articles.content:
LURAY, Va. (WHSV) - After having to scale back in recent years due to the pandemic, this year the annual Night Sky Festival is back in full swing at Shenandoah National Park.
